api_list.name: /api/app/metrics/wallet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dots1.p.rapidapi.com/api/app/metrics/wallet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dots1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/users/wallet/get/{user_id}

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: ID of user whose wallet to return

withdrawable_amount.description: User's balance that they can withdraw

credit_balance.description: User's credit balance with the application

api_list.name: /api/transactions/get/user/{user_id}

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of transactions to get (wallet or credit)
